title: Hang On, Hang On
lyrics:
We never left you
We never left you that day
We never left you
Even though you fell far away
Couldn't hold you
But you didn't wanna be here anyway



So hang on, hang on

Hang on, hang on

Hang on, hang on

'Cause you already come so far along



We never failed you

Even though you might've felt that way

We never left you

Hard to see you in so much pain

And I would've stayed there forever

But it didn't work out that way



So hang on, hang on

Hang on, hang on

Hang on, hang on

When morning comes you won't be here alone



Say you love us, babe

[?] is all we know

Say you love us, babe

As we standin' there in the shadow and stone

Say you love us, babe

[?] is all we've know

Say you love us, babe



Hang on, hang on

Hang on, hang on

Hang on, hang on

When morning comes you won't be here alone

When morning comes you won't be here alone

When morning comes you won't be here alone
